contextId.information: This can be written in positive and active form. AT: "They will certainly punish a false witness" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: A false witness will not go unpunished

contextId.information: This can be written in positive and active form. Translate this phrase the same as you did in [[:en:bible:notes:pro:19:05|19:5]]. AT: "They will certainly punish a false witness" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: A false witness will not go unpunished
